name: Platformer with One Script
description: to see the entire game just use ctrl -/+ or cmd -/+. it's a platformer. so you can use arrow keys or wasd to move. also this was made with one c# script and the unity engine so yeah. it's not that good as i only have 3 days of coding experience in unity but i hope it will be a not so fun ~7 mins of your day.
